title: #46: Talking About Listening with Heather McDonald of  Juicy Scoop
description:
The Real Crime Profile team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) welcome Heather McDonald, the host of the podcast Juicy Scoop, to talk about giving voices to victims, the power of listening and the appeal of podcasting.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
